title: GM Breweries Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 202.14 crore, up 21.89% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for GM Breweries are:Net Sales at Rs 202.14 crore in December 2025 up 21.89% from Rs. 165.84 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 42.01 crore in December 2025 up 91.22% from Rs. 21.97 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 57.33 crore in December 2025 up 85.23% from Rs. 30.95 crore in December 2024. GM Breweries EPS has increased to Rs. 18.39 in December 2025 from Rs. 9.61 in December 2024. GM Breweries shares closed at 1,053.30 on January 09, 2026 (NSE) and has given 39.04% returns over the last 6 months and 48.50% over the last 12 months.
